title: Credential Guard & LSA Protection Lab
subtitle: Deploying and validating modern Windows credential defences
prerequisites: Windows Privilege Escalation for Red Teams
learning_objectives: Deploy Credential Guard using Group Policy and device management
Enable LSA protection and validate with system diagnostics
Monitor events indicating credential theft attempts
Troubleshoot compatibility issues with legacy software
Integrate credential defences with SOC monitoring

content_blocks.title: GUARD

content.text:
### GUARD
- **G**roup Policy rollout
- **U**pdate firmware & VBS
- **A**udit events
- **R**esolve compatibility
- **D**ocument rollback

content_blocks.title: Guided Simulation

content.text:
1. Enable Credential Guard and LSA protection in a lab OU.
2. Run credential dumping tools to confirm mitigation.
3. Capture relevant events and forward them to your SIEM.
4. Test application compatibility and document issues.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Rehearse in a safe environment before applying to production.
content_blocks.real_world_connection: Dry runs reveal gaps before live execution.
